hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has alos been transmitted by Abu Hurairah through a different chain of narrators to the same effect. This version adds:He would fast all but a little of Sha'ban, rather he used to fast the whole of Sha'ban

chapter.ara-name: باب كَيْفَ كَانَ يَصُومُ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
